lines.text: Get her in here, we have to be at the ballroom at 8. No time for face powder.
We got a new man on this beat that's built like you between the ears. He saw a hole in the back of the dame's skull and figured she was slugged.
A very rare item. A picture of a dame with her mouth shut.
Write me a sob story. 'Miss Lonelyheart' won't be lonely anymore.
You know that wasn't a bad looking dame. Too bad the guy used an axe on her head. Spoiled some pretty pictures for me.
You should have started running when you got my wire, sucker.
I gambled. If the stakes are big enough, you don't run until there's nothing else left to do.
